description:
YouTube is massive with more than 1 billion people visiting YouTube each month and is the second largest search engine after the Google According to research, YouTube reaches more US adults than cable TV and potential customers who see videos are 73% more likely to buy

---

Now if you’re struggling to get results with video or if your traffic is inconsistent or your quite new to this whole video thing and don’t know where to start – then The Video Traffic Guide is for you.

Imagine a world where you get consistent targeted leads to your website, people who actually want to do business with you. Picture becoming an established authority where you create a community of raving fans who will choose you over any other competitor, why? You’ve build that relationship. Imagine having the freedom and independence to not have to worry about traffic and focus on creating value for your customers.

---

For the last year I’ve been obsessed with video – studying all the top channels on YouTube, finding out what they do differently and how they came to be so successful. I discovered 7 fundamental things that make these channels different and decided to create The Video Hacking Guide to save you the time, energy and sanity when getting started with video online – it’s quite confusing & I know what works.

---

Alot of people make excuses when getting started with video I just want to bust a few of them.

  • Video Production is too expensive: As technology is getting more advanced, video production is just getting cheaper – it’s nothing like it used to be, it’s possible to make videos with just an iPhone and a basic lighting setup.
  • I don’t know what to say in the video: that’s ok, there are many different types of videos you can make, and we will cover this in the course.
  • I’ve got no time to make videos: we all have the same 24 hrs, shooting video can be quite quick – I write a basic script & shoot 10 videos in 1 day, work smarter not harder.
  • I’m not a technical person: You don’t have to be, at the click of a button you can start filming your first video – its easy.
  • Nobody is going to watch my video: When you know what you customers are already watching it’s very easy to create the right types of videos that they’ll watch.

With Online Video You Can

  • Take Your Share of 1 billion monthly views so that you can grow your business.
  • Build more authority in your industry so that you become the first choice.
  • Get targeted leads to your website so that you can make more sales.
  • Get Ranked in Google so that you can get even more traffic back to your site.

What is the video traffic guide?

The video traffic guide is one of the best online video training schools for entrepreneurs, product based businesses, marketers, service providers, consultants and people who want to start a YouTube channel. Now it teaches people who want more traffic and leads or people who want get their message out to the world. The guide is based on 7 core modules and in the video hacking guide; I’ll be by your side – taking you through step by step of how to do it all.

Module #1: Video Strategy

Build a strong foundation for your future success

  • How to create a strong foundation to beat your competition
  • Why positioning your channel is the most important factor
  • How to uncover your core message and communicate it everywhere
  • Find who your customers really are and speak directly to them

Module #2: Channels that Crush It

Create a channel that looks great and get attention

  • The basics “101” of how to setup your channel
  • The easiest way to create a one channel banner
  • How to get more leads from one channel tweak

Module #3: Create Rocking Videos

Create simple videos that rock and people will share

  • How reverse engineer your videos to get the most views possible
  • Discover the different types of videos and what to say in each of them
  • The 5 elements that will make your videos highly addictive and spreadable
  • How to captivate the attention of viewers and keep it

Module #4: The Top Gear

Choose the right gear and tools to get started

  • Uncover what gear your really need to make hot videos
  • The basic lighting setup to get studio quality results
  • How to outsource your video editing and save hours of time
  • How to make videos without been on camera

Module #5: Video Fine Tuning

Learn the small hacks that make a big difference to your views

  • Learn the small tweaks to get more views on your videos
  • How to fine tune your videos to get the best possible results
  • The one easy step to optimize your YouTube channel
  • How to create a thumbnail image to get more clicks

Module #6: Building Your Community

Build your community of raving fans who will forever but from you

  • Learn the science of subscribers and why you need it
  • How to build your community that will always support you
  • Two easy channel hacks to get more views and subscribers
  • How to use Call to Actions to get your viewers to do what you want.

Module #7: Advanced Video Strategies

Promote your videos to get your message out to the world

  • Learn the essentials of video promotion
  • How to get Influences to promote your videos
  • Why Collaboration is key to build your channel quickly

Bonus

The Art of going Viral: Have you ever dreamed of creating a viral video? Here I will break down the basics to going viral.

Overcome the Fear of the Camera: Are you scared of the camera? Here I will give you a few keys to overcome it and become a superstar in front of the camera.

Dealing with Haters: When you put yourself out there, sometimes there’s going to be a bit of hate – I’ll show you how to deal with these sad people.

You’re Money Machine: This video is for people who have a channel and want to make some money after they’ve build their community – some great ideas in here.

Who is the Video Traffic Guide not for?

Like anything setting up your video empire is going to take work and time – the Video Hacking Guide is not for anybody who is lazy, negative – aka toxic, or a troll and people who have closed mind, who are not open to new concepts – thanks for checking out this video go take another course.

Who is the Video Traffic Guide right for?

People who want to take action and tap into the power of having a video presence online to connect more with your target audience and get targeted leads back to your website or just grow your channel. VTG is perfect for entrepreneurs, small business owners, marketers, YouTubers, consultants, authors and coaches. You need to be positive and have an open mind as I’m going to introducing some new concepts here – if that’s you great, I’m excited to work with you.

You’re Investment

The Video Traffic Guide

Here you get access to the 7 modules which break down the key components of what some of the most successful YouTube channels do and why there different, It’s took me 6 months to put all of this together. (1000 Value)

The Bonuses, PDF Charts & Videos

Here you get access to 4 videos The Art of going Viral, Overcome the Fear of the Camera, Dealing with Haters, You’re Money Machine also you get a PDF optimization cheat sheet. (300 Value)

Access to Me through the Comments section

Great we can hang out, every week I’ll be watching out for any new comments or queries so that I can give you any extra help you may need. (250 Value)

Lifetime Updates

This course is important to me and as YouTube is updating all the time – I’ll be the guy on the, I’ll keep the course fresh and updated. (450 value)

Total Value: $2000

You’re Investment: $199

Now I stand behind this course, It’s my baby and I think it’s hard not to get any results – If you’re not completely happy, Me & Udemy will be glad to give all of your money back – Udemy has a 30 day money back guarantee, so there’s no need to worry.
title: YouTube Traffic Guide - Drive Traffic, Get More Sales
